content: If a list of units is provided by questionnaire-unitOption, can the user enter a unit that is not on that list?
I presume "no" but we should probably clarify.
That would be the point I assume.
I can imagine a situation in which an available unit choice was mL and the user wanted to enter "teaspoons". But, I am not sure that is a good direction to go. I'll enter a tracker item.
I can imagine users wanting all sorts of things :) The question is what the questionnaire designer wants
